overview: Manu, a young and dreamy man lives in the loneliness of his family farm and have to put up with his sour mother-in-law who believes in God and "Holly Cash". While the conflict is changing in trench warfare, a little unknown girl enters in his life. He can not imagine how far this child will push him into a new life - for that he must face to the "Awful" and find the courage to declare his love.
title: Sur le plancher des vaches
